card.name: Alabaster Dragon
card.property: Flying When Alabaster Dragon dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Alluring Scent
card.property: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

card.name: Anaconda
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Something soft bumped against the rowboat, then was gone.

card.name: Anaconda
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

card.name: Ancestral Memories
card.property: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A peasant can do more by faith than a king by proclamation.

card.name: Archangel
card.property: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Ardent Militia
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some fight for honor and some for gold, but the militia fights for hearth and home.

card.name: Armageddon
card.property: Destroy all lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'O miserable of happy! Is this the end Of this new glorious world . . . ?'" —John Milton, Paradise Lost

card.name: Armored Pegasus
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.

card.name: Arrogant Vampire
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Charm and grace may hide a foul heart.

card.name: Assassin's Blade
card.property: Cast Assassin's Blade only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Destroy target nonblack attacking creature.

card.name: Balance of Power
card.property: If target opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

card.name: Baleful Stare
card.property: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Mountain and red card in it.

card.name: Bee Sting
card.property: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are few things as motivating as a swarm of bees.

card.name: Blaze
card.property: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Blaze
card.property: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Blessed Reversal
card.property: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.

card.name: Blinding Light
card.property: Tap all nonwhite creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Let the unjust avert their faces and contemplate their peril.

card.name: Bog Imp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't be fooled by their looks. Think of them as little knives with wings.

card.name: Bog Raiders
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who live amid decay must expect scavengers.

card.name: Bog Wraith
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It moved through the troops leaving no footprints, save on their souls.

card.name: Boiling Seas
card.property: Destroy all Islands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What burns the land, boils the seas.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Join the army, see foreign countries!" they'd said.

card.name: Breath of Life
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Bull Hippo
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stay alert: his lumbering may shake the ground itself, but in water, he glides.

card.name: Burning Cloak
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Burning Cloak deals 2 damage to that creature.

card.name: Capricious Sorcerer
card.property: {T}: Capricious Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Charging Bandits
card.property: Whenever Charging Bandits attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fear in their victims' eyes is their most cherished reward.

card.name: Charging Paladin
card.property: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A true warrior's thoughts are of victory, not death.

card.name: Charging Rhino
card.property: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A rhino rarely uses its horn to announce its charge, only to end it.

card.name: Cloak of Feathers
card.property: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A thousand feathers from a thousand birds, sewn with magic and song.

card.name: Cloud Dragon
card.property: Flying Cloud Dragon can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Cloud Pirates
card.property: Flying Cloud Pirates can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Cloud Spirit
card.property: Flying Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Command of Unsummoning
card.property: Cast Command of Unsummoning only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Return one or two target attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.

card.name: Craven Giant
card.property: Craven Giant can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best armor is to keep out of range." —Italian proverb

card.name: Craven Knight
card.property: Craven Knight can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I say victory is better than honor."

card.name: Cruel Bargain
card.property: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Cruel Fate
card.property: Look at the top five cards of target opponent's library. Put one of those cards into that player's graveyard and the rest on top of his or her library in any order.

card.name: Cruel Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more you pay for the lesson, the better you'll remember it.

card.name: Déjà Vu
card.property: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The past is a mirror of the future.

card.name: Deep Wood
card.property: Cast Deep Wood only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

card.name: Deep-Sea Serpent
card.property: Deep-Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sailors fear the deep-sea serpent; others thank the gods it has no legs.

card.name: Defiant Stand
card.property: Cast Defiant Stand only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Target creature gets +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

card.name: Desert Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never doubt a dragon just because of its size.

card.name: Devastation
card.property: Destroy all creatures and lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is much talk about the art of creation. What about the art of destruction?

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The heart's courage is the soul's guardian.

card.name: Djinn of the Lamp
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once they learn the trick of carrying their own lamps, they never touch the ground again.

card.name: Dread Charge
card.property: Black creatures you control can't be blocked this turn except by black creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As equal were their souls, so equal was their fate." —John Dryden, "Ode to Mrs. Anne Killigrew"

card.name: Dread Reaper
card.property: Flying When Dread Reaper enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

card.name: Dry Spell
card.property: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fist of dust to line your throat, a bowl of sand to fill your belly.

card.name: Earthquake
card.property: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

card.name: Ebon Dragon
card.property: Flying When Ebon Dragon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

card.name: Elite Cat Warrior
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hear that? No? That's a cat warrior."

card.name: Elite Cat Warrior
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

card.name: Elven Cache
card.property: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elves know where to harvest the best of the forest, for they planted it themselves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's up to you if you enter their woods—and up to them if you leave.

card.name: Endless Cockroaches
card.property: When Endless Cockroaches dies, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Exhaustion
card.property: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

card.name: False Peace
card.property: Target player skips all combat phases of his or her next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mutual consent is not required for war.

card.name: Feral Shadow
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all shadows are cast by light—some are cast by darkness.

card.name: Final Strike
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Final Strike, sacrifice a creature. Final Strike deals damage to target opponent equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Fire Dragon
card.property: Flying When Fire Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Fire Imp
card.property: When Fire Imp enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Fire Snake
card.property: When Fire Snake dies, destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The snake's final thrashings only spread the fire within it.

card.name: Fire Tempest
card.property: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Flashfires
card.property: Destroy all Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dry grass is tinder before the spark.

card.name: Fleet-Footed Monk
card.property: Fleet-Footed Monk can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hesitation is for the faithless. My belief lends me speed."

card.name: Flux
card.property: Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Infantry deployment is the art of putting your troops in the wrong place at the right time.

card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Forked Lightning
card.property: Forked Lightning deals 4 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

card.name: Fruition
card.property: You gain 1 life for each Forest on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Come to these woods and suffer no pain; you've burdens to lose and new life to gain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the sight of the thing the calamari vendor's eyes went wide, but from fear or avarice none could tell.

card.name: Giant Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not far into the trap, as the crow flies.

card.name: Gift of Estates
card.property: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easy to stand head and shoulders over those with no backbone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

card.name: Gravedigger
card.property: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.

card.name: Hand of Death
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death claims all but the darkest souls.

card.name: Hand of Death
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death claims all but the darkest souls.

card.name: Harsh Justice
card.property: Cast Harsh Justice only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. This turn, whenever an attacking creature deals combat damage to you, it deals that much damage to its controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though slow-witted and slow-moving, they are quick to anger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot!

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its spear has no shaft, its shield no handle.

card.name: Howling Fury
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I howl my soul to the moon, and the moon howls with me.

card.name: Hulking Cyclops
card.property: Hulking Cyclops can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

card.name: Hulking Goblin
card.property: Hulking Goblin can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bigger they are, the harder they avoid work.

card.name: Hurricane
card.property: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

card.property: Flying When Ingenious Thief enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand.

card.name: Jungle Lion
card.property: Jungle Lion can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lion's only loyalty is to its hunger.

card.name: Keen-Eyed Archers
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it has wings, shoot it. If it doesn't, shoot it anyway."

card.name: King's Assassin
card.property: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fear is as effective a weapon as the blade.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . Before honor is humility." —The Bible, Proverbs 15:33

card.name: Last Chance
card.property: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

card.name: Lava Axe
card.property: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Swing your axe as a broom, to sweep away the foe.

card.name: Lava Flow
card.property: Destroy target creature or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: People ran as never before at the thought of being buried and cremated at the same time.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't let its appearance frighten you. Let its claws and teeth do that.

card.name: Man-o'-War
card.property: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mercenary Knight
card.property: When Mercenary Knight enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Are merfolk humans with fins, or are humans merfolk with feet?

card.name: Mind Knives
card.property: Target opponent discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To dodge the unerring knife, one must be free of thought.

card.name: Mind Rot
card.property: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The herd's patience, the stampede's fury.

card.name: Mobilize
card.property: Untap all creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A rested mind is the sharpest weapon.

card.name: Monstrous Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Monstrous Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some cats are born fighters; others need a little persuading.

card.name: Moon Sprite
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am that merry wanderer of the night." —William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night's Dream

card.name: Mountain Goat
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the heroic and the mad follow mountain goat trails.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The difference between a nuisance and a threat is often merely a matter of numbers.

card.name: Mystic Denial
card.property: Counter target creature or sorcery spell.

card.name: Natural Order
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Natural Order, sacrifice a green creature. Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Natural Spring
card.property: Target player gains 8 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though many have come to this place to wash their wounds, the water has never turned red.

card.name: Nature's Cloak
card.property: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

card.name: Nature's Lore
card.property: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature's secrets can be read on every tree, every branch, every leaf.

card.name: Nature's Ruin
card.property: Destroy all green creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One chill blast—the exhalation of the grave.

card.name: Needle Storm
card.property: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Noxious Toad
card.property: When Noxious Toad dies, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Omen
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.

card.name: Owl Familiar
card.property: Flying When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dogs of war are nothing compared to the cats.

card.name: Path of Peace
card.property: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The soldier reaped the profits of peace.

card.name: Personal Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

card.name: Phantom Warrior
card.property: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The phantom warrior comes from nowhere and returns there just as quickly.

card.name: Pillaging Horde
card.property: When Pillaging Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

card.property: When Plant Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.

card.name: Primeval Force
card.property: When Primeval Force enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice three Forests.

card.name: Prosperity
card.property: Each player draws X cards.

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.property: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chaos does not choose its enemies.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What could it have swallowed to grow so large?

card.name: Raging Cougar
card.property: Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mountaineers quickly learn to travel with their spears always pointed up.

card.name: Raging Goblin
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Raging Goblin
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Charging alone takes uncommon daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

card.name: Raging Minotaur
card.property: Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing worse than a minotaur with an axe is an angry minotaur with an axe.

card.name: Rain of Salt
card.property: Destroy two target lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It pelts the land with its fury, spoiling what was once sweet.

card.name: Rain of Tears
card.property: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When emotions rain down, what rivers will be born?

card.name: Raise Dead
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The soldiers chopped and chopped, and still the great tree stood, frowning down at them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unicorns don't care if you believe in them any more than you care if they believe in you.

card.name: Renewing Dawn
card.property: You gain 2 life for each Mountain target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dawn brings a new day, and a new day brings hope.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One of the forest's best protectors is the forest itself.

card.name: Sacred Knight
card.property: Sacred Knight can't be blocked by black and/or red creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No flame, no horror can sway me from my cause."

card.name: Sacred Nectar
card.property: You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For he on honey-dew hath fed, And drunk the milk of Paradise." —Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "Kubla Khan"

card.name: Scorching Spear
card.property: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.

card.name: Scorching Winds
card.property: Cast Scorching Winds only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Scorching Winds deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

card.name: Seasoned Marshal
card.property: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Serpent Assassin
card.property: When Serpent Assassin enters the battlefield, you may destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Serpent Warrior
card.property: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The less flesh there is, the more teeth there seem to be.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They watched as the snake shed layer after layer until only cold bone remained.

card.name: Snapping Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drakes claim to be dragons—until the dragons show up.

card.name: Sorcerous Sight
card.property: Look at target opponent's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Soul Shred
card.property: Soul Shred deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It would be a shame to let life slip away to nothing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has more teeth than fit in its mouth.

card.name: Spiritual Guardian
card.property: When Spiritual Guardian enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Spitting Earth
card.property: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Spotted Griffin
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the cat flies and the bird stalks, guard your horses carefully.

card.name: Stalking Tiger
card.property: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one is happy when they notice a tiger.

card.name: Starlight
card.property: You gain 3 life for each black creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stars are like coins dropped into the night: their light buys safe passage.

card.name: Starlit Angel
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To soar as high as hope, to dive as swift as justice.

card.name: Steadfastness
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Brute force wins the battles. Conviction wins the wars.

card.name: Stern Marshal
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.property: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I cast a thousand tiny suns— Beware my many dawns.

card.name: Storm Crow
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

card.name: Summer Bloom
card.property: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . inviting the soul to wander for a spell in abysses of solitude . . . ." —Kate Chopin, The Awakening

card.name: Taunt
card.property: During target player's next turn, creatures that player controls attack you if able.

card.name: Temporary Truce
card.property: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two a player draws this way, that player gains 2 life.

card.name: Theft of Dreams
card.property: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Energy is never lost, only transformed.

card.name: Thing from the Deep
card.property: Whenever Thing from the Deep attacks, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seafarers fear sailing off the world's edge not so much as down its gullet.

card.name: Thundering Wurm
card.property: When Thundering Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.

card.name: Thundermare
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.) When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

card.name: Tidal Surge
card.property: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'Twas when the seas were roaring With hollow blasts of wind . . . ." —John Gay, "The What D'Ye Call It"

card.name: Time Ebb
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

card.name: Touch of Brilliance
card.property: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Acting on one good idea is better than hoarding all the world's knowledge.

card.name: Treetop Defense
card.property: Cast Treetop Defense only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn. (They can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Undying Beast
card.property: When Undying Beast dies, put it on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Untamed Wilds
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Valorous Charge
card.property: White creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stand in the way of truth at your peril.

card.name: Vampiric Feast
card.property: Vampiric Feast deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not always gold the thief is after.

card.name: Vampiric Touch
card.property: Vampiric Touch deals 2 damage to target opponent and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A touch, not comforting, but of death.

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.property: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His presence brings not only a strong arm but also renewed hope.

card.name: Vengeance
card.property: Destroy target tapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bitter as wormwood, sweet as mulled wine.

card.name: Virtue's Ruin
card.property: Destroy all white creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All must fall, and those who stand highest fall hardest.

card.name: Volcanic Dragon
card.property: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Volcanic Hammer
card.property: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cast the weight as though it were a die, to see a rival's fate.

card.name: Wall of Granite
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wisest man builds his house behind the rock.

card.name: Wall of Swords
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

card.name: Warrior's Charge
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Warrior's Charge
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is not the absence of fear that makes a warrior, but its domination.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to say for certain which end is more dangerous.

card.name: Wicked Pact
card.property: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

card.name: Willow Dryad
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some think that dryads are the dreams of trees.

card.name: Wind Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings." —William Blake, The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

card.name: Winds of Change
card.property: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Winter's Grasp
card.property: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Winter settles on the land, and the land prays it will wake.

card.name: Withering Gaze
card.property: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.

card.name: Wood Elves
card.property: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As flies to wanton boys, are we to the gods. They kill us for their sport." —William Shakespeare, King Lear
